alert.note: Alert for Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:04PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dawson County through 545 PM CDT... At 503 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Sumner to 7 miles west of Eustis. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to around 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Cozad, Gothenburg, Eddyville, Willow Island and Farnam. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 237. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
